news.title: Agriculture isn't nearing trade war tariffs crisis, 'it is full blown crisis already' farmers say
news.summary: U.S. agriculture exporters say global backlash to President Trump's tariffs are already resulting in canceled orders and farm layoffs. U.S.-based farmers say they are already seeing cancellations and layoffs.

news.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says it's up to China to de-escalate trade tensions
news.summary: The comments come with markets on edge over the direction of tariffs. The comments come as markets are on edge about the future of the US-China trade war.

news.title: IBM pledges $150 billion to boost U.S. tech growth, computer manufacturing
news.summary: The funds include $30 billion to advance U.S. manufacturing of its mainframe and quantum computers. The funds will be used for research, development, and manufacturing.

news.title: PayPal kicks off fintech earnings as investors fear impact of Trump tariffs on consumer spending
news.summary: PayPal, Block and Affirm will report earnings next week. PayPal reports earnings on Tuesday, followed by Block on Thursday. Affirm reports on Thursday and Block on Friday.

news.title: Meta’s AI spending comes into focus amid Trump’s tariff policies
news.summary: Meta hosts its first Llama-branded conference for developers then reports earnings the next day. The company is expected to report its first quarter results next week.

news.title: Stocks have had a good bounce. But here’s why this investment manager thinks lows will be retested.
news.summary: Dan Niles worries that we’ve just seen a bear market rally and valuations are still too high. Dan Niles: We’re in the midst of a 'bear market rally'

news.title: If a financial adviser wants to roll over your retirement savings, watch out
news.summary: Older investors especially might end up in worse financial shape after a rollover. Follow your money: Older investors especially may end up with a worse financial situation.

news.title: 5 charts that show how Trump’s first 100 days have shaped Americans’ finances
news.summary: Prices were relatively stable in Trump’s first months in office. Yet the stock market erased trillions in household wealth. Consumers are worried about the looming impact of tariffs.

news.title: Massive power outage strikes Spain and Portugal
news.summary: The exact cause of the widespread outage was still unclear roughly two hours later. The exact cause was not immediately clear. The outage was expected to last for about two hours.

news.title: Domino’s U.S. same-store sales slip as cooling economy chills pizza maker’s profit
news.summary: Domino's international business provides a lift to results, but its stock falls in premarket trading. Domino’s international business providing a Lift to results.
